header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Experienced Software Engineer with 6+ years building scalable, cloud-native applications and distributed systems. Proven expertise in Java, Python, AWS, and event-driven architectures. Successfully delivered high-impact projects serving millions of users at Disney, with a strong background in schema management, data processing, and full-stack development.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Architected and maintained the Schema Registry platform serving 50+ engineering teams using Java, AWS Smithy, and AWS Kinesis
Built a stream snapshotting distributed system enabling real-time state management for high-volume streaming data, processing millions of events daily for Disney+ and Hulu content metadata
Built schema validation systems and compatibility checking tools, integrating with AWS Kinesis for streaming data pipelines

Built data pipelines using Databricks, Apache Spark, and AWS S3 to process streaming data into Disney's data lake, enabling executive dashboard creation and business intelligence reporting across the organization
Implemented multi-language artifact generation (Scala, Java, Python) with custom serialization logic, Protobuf integration, and AWS client SDK integration
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver event-driven solutions supporting Disney's streaming platform infrastructure

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer
experience.detail: Developed a proof-of-stake blockchain platform using Scala and Akka actors, implementing distributed consensus algorithms and peer-to-peer networking protocols
Built a transaction streaming service with Protobuf APIs using http4s, Cats Effect, and MongoDB for real-time blockchain data indexing and querying
Designed and implemented RESTful management APIs for node configuration, key management, and transaction processing
Established an end-to-end test suite using Postman with CI/CD integration, providing development teams with API test coverage and end-users with API examples

experience.title: Software Engineer I & II
experience.detail: Developed full-stack web applications using C#/.NET, Azure cloud services, and Microsoft SQL Server for the construction project management platform
Implemented an Event Sourcing architecture for the Change Management workflow, providing a highly-scalable solution for a complex business domain with multiple data sources
Built RESTful APIs and microservices integrated with enterprise systems, serving thousands of construction teams
Enhanced application performance and user experience through database optimization and responsive UI development

experience.title: QA Automation Engineer
experience.detail: Designed and implemented an automated testing framework using C# and Selenium, reducing manual testing effort by 75%
Developed an API testing suite for microservices validation and implemented performance testing coverage providing consistent feedback to development teams
Created maintainable test automation solutions enabling non-technical team members to write and execute comprehensive test suites
